GSD.description:
lockdown: also lock down previous kgdb use

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.119 by commit a8f4d63142f947cd22fa615b8b3b8921cdaf4991. For more details please see the references link.
